content:
ProjectLoadSettings Enum

Definition

Defines how MSBuild loads a project.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum ProjectLoadSettings
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ProjectLoadSettings

Fields

IgnoreMissingImports

Ignore nonexistent .targets files when loading the project.
None

Load the project normally.
